statements: SELECT * FROM grid_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, duration_hours FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost > 5000;
SELECT asset_id, maintenance_type FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE duration_hours >= 5 ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type='Preventive Maintenance';
SELECT AVG(duration_hours), SUM(maintenance_cost) FROM grid_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT * FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, duration_hours FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_cost ASC;

SELECT asset_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_cost FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE schedule_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '543e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005') ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE duration_hours BETWEEN 4 AND 8 ORDER BY asset_id;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost < 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_task, frequency FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_task, last_completed_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE frequency > 3;

SELECT record_id, maintenance_task, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN maintenance_records ON maintenance_schedule.schedule_id = maintenance_records.schedule_id WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT maintenance_task, frequency, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_task, frequency, last_completed_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_task LIKE '%oil%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE schedule_id IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE frequency < 10) ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, COUNT(record_id) AS num_maintenance_records FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY schedule_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM grid_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Operational';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, technician_name, details FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_logs FROM maintenance_log GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM grid_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE location LIKE '%Main%' AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-06-15';
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, technician_name, details FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT grid_maintenance_schedule.*, equipment.equipment_name, maintenance_log.technician_name FROM grid_maintenance_schedule JOIN equipment ON grid_maintenance_schedule.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id JOIN maintenance_log ON grid_maintenance_schedule.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id WHERE grid_maintenance_schedule.completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM grid_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, manufacturer FROM equipment;
SELECT maintenance_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM grid_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT cost_id, maintenance_id, cost, currency FROM maintenance_cost WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM grid_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';

SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type, COUNT(cost_id) AS total_costs FROM grid_maintenance LEFT JOIN maintenance_cost ON grid_maintenance.maintenance_id = maintenance_cost.maintenance_id GROUP BY maintenance_id, maintenance_type;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_id, cost, currency FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_cost ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_cost.maintenance_id;
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_description FROM maintenance_log WHERE log_description LIKE '%maintenance%' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GridMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_desc FROM GridMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT log_date, log_description, log_status FROM MaintenanceLogs;
SELECT id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_result FROM MaintenanceHistory;
SELECT block_id, timestamp, description FROM BlockchainMetadata;
SELECT * FROM GridMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC, maintenance_type DESC
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_desc FROM GridMaintenanceSchedule WHERE grid_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_desc FROM GridMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' AND maintenance_desc LIKE '%inspection%'
SELECT log_date, log_description, log_status FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT block_id, description FROM BlockchainMetadata WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
